name: The Curse of the Cake
description:
Controls:

Mouse - Cat's movement.

C (or clicking on the name) - Use catnip

A (or clicking on the name) - Eat cake

===============================

This prototype was made for the Anything Goes Jam [8 bits to Infinity] and thus, I've embraced the following challenges:

- The player cannot use weapons

- The player character cannot walk

- Use a maximum of two colors

When creating this game I've tried to pay homage to some old games that I used to play in the DOS era :)

================================

In the era of Chaos, when all the beings were starving for sugar, a little girl and her cat  Hannah found the answer to life, the universe and everything, she found the Cake of Infinity.

Now she must protect it from all the powerful beings of the universe, and for that she will use her Mighty Laser Pointer.

================================

If you enjoyed the idea, leave a comment, if I have a good amount of positive feedback I may make it into a full game. :)
